title: 17-year-old killed in shooting near UC
content:
CINCINNATI, OH (FOX19) -
A 17-year-old boy was shot and killed near the University of Cincinnati Monday night, police officials said early Tuesday.
The victim, Clarence Gatewood, is not a UC student, and it's not clear what led up him being shot several times on Short Vine Street near Daniels Street about 6:45 p.m., said Lt. David Schofield, the night chief.
A witness said he heard about seven shots fired.
Gatewood taken to University of Cincinnati Medical Center, where he died, according to the night chief.
Police investigated through the night.
No arrests were made, and no suspect information was available.
